sentences.english: It may look like a severe sunburn, later becoming reddish Brown, rough, and scaly.
sentences.chinese: 初看似严重的晒斑，后呈红褐色，粗糙并有鳞屑。

sentences.english: Her hands were like the dry bark of an old cak tree, wrinkled, rough and hard.
sentences.chinese: 她的手向老树皮一样生皱粗糙和坚硬。

sentences.english: South Schisandra is singly small, flesh thin, looked withered, seeds there is no gloss rough.
sentences.chinese: 而南五味子粒小肉薄显干瘪，种子粗糙无光泽。

sentences.english: Knurling is the process of producing a roughened surface by means of a specialized forming tool called a knurl .
sentences.chinese: 是一种专门成形刀具叫滚花轮，将表面制成粗糙表面。

sentences.english: Attribute reduction is a research focus in rough set theory.
sentences.chinese: 属性约简是粗糙集理论中的一个研究重点。

sentences.english: The hero of LittleBigPlanet is a tiny person made out of some kind of coarse-textured fabric.
sentences.chinese: 游戏的英雄是一个像是某种粗糙布料制作的小人。

sentences.english: This paint will adhere to any surface, whether rough or smooth.
sentences.chinese: 这种油漆能附着于任何粗糙或光滑的表面。

sentences.english: Effects of different preparation procedures on abutment surface roughness.
sentences.chinese: 不同预备程序对基牙表面粗糙度的影响。

sentences.english: Governance of changes and versions for services are crude and unrefined
sentences.chinese: 服务的更改和版本治理非常粗糙并且未定义。

sentences.english: The finest edge is made with the blunt whetstone. JOHN LYL.
sentences.chinese: 最锐利的锋刃是从粗糙的磨刀石上磨出来的。

sentences.english: The presence of rough surfaces or ledges make the room difficult to clean.
sentences.chinese: 粗糙的表面或壁架的存在使房间很难清理。

sentences.english: They knocked together two rough mailboxes with wooden boards.
sentences.chinese: 他们用木板草草地做成了两个粗糙的信箱。

sentences.english: Today the term is most often restricted to the rough plaster coating of exterior walls.
sentences.chinese: 如今此词多用来指外墙的粗糙硬膏表面。

sentences.english: Her hands were roughened by housework.
sentences.chinese: 她的手由于家务劳动而变得粗糙。

sentences.english: I had been living for weeks in rough mining camps with other gold miners.
sentences.chinese: 几个星期以来我一直活在粗糙的矿场和其他黄金矿工。

sentences.english: The bark of cinnamon trees, brown in color.
sentences.chinese: 桂树的皮，外皮粗糙呈现褐色。

definition: (of dry soil, skin etc) to crack/to chap
